subject: Relationships
title: The Power of Asking Good Questions
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Power of Asking Good Questions.

hook.text: 'How was your day?' gets 'Fine.' 'What was the best part of your day?' starts a real conversation.

buildup.text: Open-ended questions signal genuine curiosity. Closed questions signal routine â€” or worse, obligation.

discovery.text: Couples who ask each other deeper questions weekly report 25% higher intimacy scores after three months.

twist.text: The best questions feel slightly vulnerable: 'What do you need from me right now?' risks honest answers.

climax.text: A great question opens a door. A great listener walks through it. Together, they build understanding.

punchline.text: Better questions create better conversations â€” and deeper love.
